TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataLoadOptions extends System.Object

summary.span: Provides for immediate loading and filtering of related data.

span.span: Provides for immediate loading and filtering of related data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 一般General 當您查詢物件時，實際上只擷取了所要求的物件。When you query for an object, you actually retrieve only the object you requested. *相關*物件不會自動擷取一次。The *related* objects are not automatically fetched at the same time. (如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 跨關聯性查詢](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/querying-across-relationships.md)。)(For more information, see [Querying Across Relationships](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/querying-across-relationships.md).) 類別提供兩種方法可以達到指定的相關資料的立即載入。The class provides two methods to achieve immediate loading of specified related data. 方法可讓以立即載入與主要目標相關的資料。The method allows for immediate loading of data related to the main target. 方法是用來篩選相關的物件。The method allows for filtering related objects. ## 規則Rules 請注意下列規則有關使用量：Note the following rules regarding usage: - 指派至第一個查詢執行之後會產生例外狀況。Assigning a to a after the first query has been executed generates an exception. - 修改指派給之後產生例外狀況Modifying a after it has been assigned to a generates an exception ## 循環處理Cycle Handling 和指示詞不得建立循環。 and directives must not create cycles. 下列代表此類圖形的範例：The following represent examples of such graphs: - 範例 1︰ 自我遞迴Example 1: Self recursive - `dlo.LoadWith(e => e.Reports);` - 範例 2： 上一步 指標Example 2: Back-pointers - `dlo.LoadWith (c => C.Orders);` - `dlo.LoadWith (o => o.Customer);` - 範例 3︰ 較長的循環Example 3: Longer cycles 雖然這不應該發生在已妥善正規化的模型，就可以了。Although this should not occur in a well-normalized model, it is possible. - `dlo.LoadWith (a => a.Bs);` - `dlo.LoadWith (b => b.Cs);` - `dlo.LoadWith (c => c.As);` - 範例 4︰ 自我遞迴的子查詢Example 4: Self recursive subQueries - `dlo.AssociateWith(a=>a.As.Where(a=>a.Id=33));` - 範例 5︰ 長遞迴子查詢Example 5: Longer recursive subqueries - `dlo.AssociateWith(a=>a.Bs.Where(b=>b.Id==3));` - `dlo.AssociateWith(b=>b.As.Where(a=>a.Id==3));` 以下是一些一般的規則可幫助您了解在這些情況下可能發生的狀況。The following are some general rules that help you understand what occurs in these scenarios. **LoadWith**每次呼叫會檢查是否已引進循環至圖形。**LoadWith** Each call to checks whether cycles have been introduced into the graph. 如果有，如範例 1、 2 和 3，例外狀況會擲回。If there are, as in Examples 1, 2, and 3, an exception is thrown. **AssociateWith**在執行階段引擎不會套用現有的子查詢子句運算式內的關聯性。**AssociateWith** The engine at run time does not apply the existing SubQuery clauses to the relationship inside the expression. - 範例 4`Where`子句會針對所有執行`A`，而不只是子篩選由本身的子查詢運算式 （因為這樣才是遞迴）In Example 4, the `Where` clause is executed against all `A`, not just the ones sub-filtered by the SubQuery expression itself (because that would be recursive) - 範例 5 中，第一個`Where`子句會套用到所有`B`s，即使是在子查詢沒有`B`。In Example 5, the first `Where` clause is applied to all the `B`s, even though there are subqueries on `B`. 第二個`Where`子句會套用到所有`A`即使是沒有 s 的子查詢上`A`。The second `Where` clause is applied to all the `A`s even though there are subqueries on `A`. ## Examples 當您擷取`Customers`從 Northwind 範例資料庫中，您可以使用以指定`Orders`也是要擷取。When you retrieve `Customers` from the Northwind sample database, you can use to specify that `Orders` is also to be retrieved. 您甚至可以指定的哪些子集`Orders`擷取。You can even specify which subset of `Orders` to retrieve.

summary.span: Filters the objects retrieved for a particular relationship.

span.span: Filters the objects retrieved for a particular relationship.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在下列範例中，內部迴圈會逐一查看只有那些`Orders`，尚未運送今天。In the following example, the inner loop iterates only over those `Orders` that have not been shipped today. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.DataLoadOptions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.dataloadoptions/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.DataLoadOptions#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.dataloadoptions/vb/module1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需如何避免循環資訊，請參閱。For information about how to avoid cycles, see . ## Examples 在下列範例中，內部迴圈會逐一查看只有那些`Orders`，尚未運送今天。In the following example, the inner loop iterates only over those `Orders` that have not been shipped today. summary.span: Retrieves specified data related to the main target by using a lambda expression.

span.span: Retrieves specified data related to the main target by using a lambda expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在下列範例中，執行查詢時，會擷取位在倫敦 (London) 之所有 `Orders` 的所有 `Customers`。In the following example, all the `Orders` for all the `Customers` who are located in London are retrieved when the query is executed. 如此一來，後續存取 `Orders` 物件上的 `Customer` 屬性時，便不會觸發新的資料庫查詢。As a result, successive access to the `Orders` property on a `Customer` object does not trigger a new database query. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.DataLoadOptions#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.dataloadoptions/cs/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.DataLoadOptions#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.dataloadoptions/vb/module1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void LoadWith<T>(class System.Linq.Expressions.Expression`1<class System.Func`2<!!T, object>> expression) cil managed
Public Sub LoadWith(Of T) (expression As Expression(Of Func(Of T, Object)))

typeparam.name: T

span.span: Type that is queried against.

typeparam.span: 如果這個型別不相符，則會擲回例外狀況。

span.span: If this type is unmapped, an exception is thrown.

param.name: expression
param.span: Identifies the field or property to be retrieved.

span.span: Identifies the field or property to be retrieved.

param.span: If the expression does not identify a field or property that represents a one-to-one or one-to-many relationship, an exception is thrown.

span.span: If the expression does not identify a field or property that represents a one-to-one or one-to-many relationship, an exception is thrown.

summary.span: Specifies which sub-objects to retrieve when a query is submitted for an object of type T.

span.span: Specifies which sub-objects to retrieve when a query is submitted for an object of type T.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您不能指定兩個層級關聯性的載入 (例如`Orders.OrderDetails`)。You cannot specify the loading of two levels of relationships (for example, `Orders.OrderDetails`). 在這些案例中，您必須指定兩個不同方法。In these scenarios you must specify two separate methods. 若要避免循環，請參閱 < 備註 > 一節中。To avoid cycling, see Remarks section in . ## Examples 在下列範例中，執行查詢時，會擷取位在倫敦 (London) 之所有 `Orders` 的所有 `Customers`。In the following example, all the `Orders` for all the `Customers` who are located in London are retrieved when the query is executed. 如此一來，後續存取 `Orders` 物件上的 `Customer` 屬性時，便不會觸發新的資料庫查詢。As a result, successive access to the `Orders` property on a `Customer` object does not trigger a new database query. [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.DataLoadOptions#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.dataloadoptions/cs/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.DataLoadOptions#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.dataloadoptions/vb/module1.vb#2)]
